name: Datascape Capital - Jiulong
text:
Place 1 "Datascape Gate" card directly from your Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, then apply the following effects in sequence, based on the number of "Datascape Gate" cards you control.
? 2+: "Datascape" monsters you control gain 200 ATK for the rest of this turn.
? 3+: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY.
? 4: Special Summon up to 4 "Datascape" monsters with different names from your Extra Deck.
You can only activate 1 "Datascape Capital - Jiulong" per turn.
